author: A_Brickset_user
title: Another Thing
review: As this is another car. Buuuuut it is a cool nother' car. For spaceport, is the best company of space if it was anything. Like Russell's LSA. Nadda. The litle buggy has cool radar and is a good incuding if you have a nack for spaceport

author: Paradoxymoron
title: Moon buggy? How will he breathe?
review:
This is a nice little set with some nice peices too.

Pros:
trans-neon green radar dish
walkie talkie
nice minifig
cool and easy build

Cons:
If it's on the moon, why doesn't the minifig have a helmet 'stead of a hat?

Overall good set, 4/5 get it if you get the chance!
Eerex Sweeher, commanding officer of squadron 13 in the Tuousrol-Voan rebellion.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Space Port) - Space Port Moon Buggy Review
review:
This is a good little set to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only 2 pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 25 pieces. I don't know how much it was when it was on sale but I think this set is worth the money.

Minifigures

The figure has a white overall, a blue cap and a headset. It's a very nice looking figure for sure.

The build

The build is very nice and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/1180-1.jpg[/img]


This vehicle may doesn't do much but it's still very easy to maneuver it. The only play feature which we get is that the radar can be adjusted. As I told you in the beginning: It's a good little set to have - even for pieces which you can use for future MOC's and/or brickfilms for sure.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
